content:
One of the violators of the state border was reflected from the group, climbed into the bush and twisted into the embryo pose to escape from the border guards.

About the inventive evidenceShe reported March 8State Border Service of Ukraine.

According to her, the border guards of the Podilsky detachment in Odesa region with the help of technical means found five violators of the state border.

The motion of the offender men was observed by the drone operator, who immediately directed the outfit for their detention. However, one of the violators still wanted to remain unnoticed, for this purpose "reflected" from the group and hid in the huts, but did not work.

The detainees explained that they intended to illegally enter the Transnistrian region of Moldova.

To do this, they appealed to the administrator of one of the telegrams.

The latter, for $ 6,000 from each, gave online navigation to the border.

For men, protocols on administrative offenses were drawn up. Cases were transferred to court.

BeforeIt became knownthat the Transcarpathian, who took $ 6,500 for a run, was suspected.
title: Outside of the embryo did not help the Odessa Skill
description: The State Border Service of Ukraine announced the resourceful evaster service on March 8. ...
author: Army Inform
